itunes:title: Episode 311 - Special Guest Mayans MC Star Vincent Vargas
title: Episode 311 - Special Guest Mayans MC Star Vincent Vargas
itunes:author: Tetherball Academy Media
itunes:subtitle: Ross Patterson sits down with actor Vincent "Rocco" Vargas the evening before the premiere of his soon to be hit tv series "Mayans MC" to discuss the show and how crazy his life is now.  You knew him as our DB co-host, now you'll know him as your new fav...
itunes:summary:
Ross Patterson sits down with actor Vincent "Rocco" Vargas the evening before the premiere of his soon to be hit tv series "Mayans MC" to discuss the show and how crazy his life is now.  You knew him as our DB co-host, now you'll know him as your new favorite actor. We are super proud of him.

Buy Ross' New Book "When Darkness Falls, He Doesn't Catch It" https://www.amazon.com/When-Darkness-Falls-Doesnt-Catch/dp/0692096663/ref=tmm_hrd_swatch_0?_encoding=UTF8&qid=1530647620&sr=1-2

description:
Ross Patterson sits down with actor Vincent "Rocco" Vargas the evening before the premiere of his soon to be hit tv series "Mayans MC" to discuss the show and how crazy his life is now.  You knew him as our DB co-host, now you'll know him as your new favorite actor. We are super proud of him.

Buy Ross' New Book "When Darkness Falls, He Doesn't Catch It" https://www.amazon.com/When-Darkness-Falls-Doesnt-Catch/dp/0692096663/ref=tmm_hrd_swatch_0?_encoding=UTF8&qid=1530647620&sr=1-2
